title: Now that there is only two SR queues, can we have normal Draft?
body:
Now that we no longer have Ranked 5's or teambuilder, Why doesn't OCE have normal draft?

We only have Blind pick and ranked.
Blind pick has a whole host of problems. (endlessly playing against the same champs, Mirror matchups etc..)
Isn't it time we have an option other than Ranked or blind pick? The playerbase for OCE is pretty stable. when we had normal draft before it was removed (which was a mistake in my opinion) i would get a match regularly under 5 minutes. That means there was plenty of people playing it.

When Ranked queue was down earlier today we only had one option, Blind pick.
THAT is a problem.
We have to play in blind pick against champions that are Known problems. that haven't been nerfed yet.
THAT is a problem.
